life-description: Thoughts on life, perspectives on things, and observations about society are all written here.
reading-description: Mainly reading notes and reflections on reference books, business thinking, and personal growth.
review-description: Recording impressions and emotions after watching movies, TV series, animations, comics, and novels. It's also for my future self to look back on during different periods and stages of life.
software-development-description: Difficulties encountered and technical notes in software development (currently mostly web frontend), with occasional workplace insights.
daily-description: Journal-style records of fleeting thoughts in daily life (mostly reposted from social media).
